description: This file is the main application entry point for a Notes app built with LightningJS (Blits framework). It sets up the root application component, defines styling, and configures routing with NotesLayout as the main view.

classes.name: Application
classes.description: Main application class from LightningJS Blits framework used to create the root application.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that sets document body styles such as margin, background, and text color when the application is initialized.
